title: Average of 2 positive ints - explain error

content.question: Which of the following best describes the error, if any, in the code segment?

choices.label: There is no error; the code segment works as intended.
In the expression  (double) (sum / 2),  the cast to  double  is applied too late, so the average will be less than the expected result for even values of  sum.
In the expression  (double) (sum / 2),  the cast to  double  is applied too late, so the average will be less than the expected result for odd values of  sum.
In the expression  (double) (sum / 2),  the cast to  double  is applied too late, so the average will be greater than the expected result for odd values of  sum.

content.answer: In the expression  (double) (sum / 2),  the cast to  double  is applied too late, so the average will be less than the expected result for odd values of  sum.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
